documentation.text: Counterpart to Solidity's `+` operator. - Addition cannot overflow.
Counterpart to Solidity's `-` operator.- Subtraction cannot overflow.
Counterpart to Solidity's `*` operator.- Multiplication cannot overflow.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "SafeMath: division by zero. Action canceled."

arguments.value: SafeMath: division by zero. Action canceled.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "SafeMath: division by zero. Action canceled."

documentation.text:
Counterpart to Solidity's `/` operator. Note: this function uses a
 `revert` opcode (which leaves remaining gas untouched) while Solidity
 uses an invalid opcode to revert (consuming all remaining gas).
- The divisor cannot be zero.
